name: Train HMM
description: Trains a hidden markov model using observations.

parameters.name: model_name
parameters.description: Name of the model to be trained. If a model with that name is already available, that model will be used for additional training. Otherwise a new model with this name will be instantiated.

parameters.name: destroy_on_eof
parameters.description: Will this model be cleaned up once EOF is reached.

parameters.name: observations_field
parameters.description: The field which contains the observations as a sequence of integers. The HMM is sequentially trained on all these sequences within a bucket.

parameters.name: steps
parameters.description: The number of steps to run the Baum-Welch algorithm on each sequence of integers within the bucket.

parameters.name: num_hidden
parameters.description: The number of distinct hidden states.

parameters.name: num_observable
parameters.description: The number of distinct observable states.
